choices: Skip to after The Titans come together.
111.content:
Beast Boy had just arrived in Jump City and already things were a mess as he saw what appeared to be a young, beautiful teenage girl smashing the city square to pieces. She was now repeatedly slamming her restrained arms against the support beam of a pizza joint with civilians on top of the platform. So the changeling quickly leapt into action, changing into a ram and slamming his horns into her, sending her flying into a nearby car.

Beast Boy then changed back to human and addressed the alien girl now glaring at him with a literal green fire in her eye. "Any chance you want to stop wrecking the city and go out to get some pizza?" he asked casually like it was just a normal day. The girl responded with effortlessly picking up the car with her foot and tossing it at him. He dodge by turning to a mouse and scurrying to a safe distance before changing back "So that's a no then?" he asked with the same casual tone.

Thus began an intense battle between them as the girls incredible strength, durability and battle prowess was evenly match with any form that Beast Boy could take. But then things changed when Robin and a big dude in a hoodie joined the fight. For a second it looked like things were going well, but then the alien warrior slammed her arms against the ground hard, finally freeing her hands, so she could let loose a volley of starbolts that caused even more destruction. But after said volley the girl fell to her knees in exhaustion.

"The girl's going to wreck the whole city." said the big guy.

"I won't let her. I won't lose this fight." Robin said determinedly. But just the young heroes were about to charge back into the fray, a black magical shield in the shape of a raven appeared before them.

"Maybe..fight isn't the answer." said a soft monotone voice as a young teenage girl wearing a blue cloak with a hood shrouding most of her face. She looked towards the alien hoping that they would see what she was talking about.

Beast Boy did, he noticed the restraints on her arms and a light bulb lit up in his head "Oooh. Okay, hang back for minute guys. I got this." he said confidently as he walked to the alien.

"Who put you in charge string bean?" said the big guy a little insulted.

But Beast Boy just gave him a carefree grin "Don't worry about it, I deal with dangerous women all the time." he said reassuringly as he approached the girl on her knees.

"I bet you $100 she fries him." the big guy said.

"I'll take that bet." Robin said.

"He will be fine." the hooded girl said. [Hopefully.]

As Beast Boy got closer to the alien, she stood up with her fists lit up, ready to unleash another volley of starbolts at her command. She said something in a strange language in way that seemed to say "Stay back!" Beast Boy raise his hand in a none treatening gesture "Easy there, my name is Beast Boy. And I don't want to fight, I want to help." he said soothingly as he turn one of his index fingers into a claw.

The alien asked in a demanding tone that may translate to "What are you doing?!" Beast Boy gave her a gentle smile "Trust me, it's going to be alright."

Even though she couldn't understand his words she could feel the sincerity in his voice, she slowly relaxed her arms and her eyes lost their fiery glow to reveal sclera of light green and pupils of deep emerald green. In fact now that Beast Boy was able to get a proper look at her she was one of the most beautiful girls he had ever seen. With a body that all super models would kill for, long fiery red hair, flawless orange skin and her armor really complimented her figure.

Then Beast Boy realized he was staring as he quickly shook his head to get his focus back. He then used his clawed finger to pick the lock on her arm restraints, after a few seconds the lock was open and her arms were free.

"There we go!" Beast Boy said with cheer as the alien rubbed her free arms in surprise "Now with that out of the way maybe we can go get that pizz-" his kind invitation was cut shot by the alien girl grabbing him by the shirt and pulling him in for a fierce kiss.

After a few seconds of intense liplock she broke the kiss and pushed a stunned Beast Boy to the ground "If you do not wish to be destroyed, you will leave me alone!" she said threateningly in fluent english with her eye glowing again. She then flew into the air, but as she left her eye lost their fierce glow and turned soft and a sweet smile appeared on her gorgeous face. Both from the joy of freedom and because of the kindness of that strange but cute green boy.

Everyone was left speechless, especially Beast Boy who just lost his first kiss. "What just happened?" the shape shifter asked with great confusion.

"For one thing these two lost a bet and now owe me $200." said the hooded girl with dry yet smug tone.

"Oh man." the big guy said dejectedly. And Robin just groaned in annoyance.
111.title: Starfire's kiss.

choices: Skip to after The Titans come together.
1111.content:
"What kind of bet?" Beast Boy asked curiously.

Robin and the big guy were looking rather sheepish and reluctant to say anything, so the hooded girl said it for them "They each bet $100 that she would fry you, while I bet that you would be fine."

Beast Boy crossed his arms and gave the two a disappointed glare "Seriously guys? Not cool." Then he turned into a bloodhound and started to sniff around the battlefield and the air.

"Trying to get find the alien?" deduced Robin.

Beast Boy turned human "Yep and I got her scent!" he said cheerfully.

"Hoping that she'll give you another kiss?" the big guy asked sarcastically.

Beast Boy's face turned red and he had a dopey grin on his face for a second, but he shook his head to regain focus "While that would be awesome, I really just find out who or what captured her in the first place. You guys saw those cuffs on her arms, seriously heavy duty stuff. With how strong she was there is no way that she was put in those things without a fight. And anyone who would go through all that trouble would not let her go so easily."

"He's right. There is a good chance that she an escaped criminal and we need to make sure she's not a threat." Robin addressed the assembled heroes.

"Well you two have fun with that." the big guy said dismissively as he walked away.

"What?! Aw come man!" Beast Boy ran after him not wanting to lose a potential friend "We could really use your help. And after all this is over we could hang out sometime. Do you play video gam-" his friendly questioning was cut short when the big guy stopped abruptly making Beast Boy walk face first into his back, which was like walking into a steel wall.

The big guy then pulled down his hood to reveal himself to be a young black man with half his face replaced with blue circuitry and a red bionic eye "There! Take a good long look! I had an accident and now I'm a monster alright, a cyborg!" he said clearly used to this sort of thing by now. And he was fully ready for the little green dude to start running away screaming in fear just like everyone else.

But instead what he got was Beast Boy staring at him with stars in his eyes "Cyborg?! Cool! You're like Robot Man 2.0!" he said looking over every inch of the big guy with great enthusiasm.

"You're a weird little dude, you know that?" Cyborg asked rhetorically.

"Hehe so I've been told." Beast Boy said proudly. "But seriously Cyborg, can I call you Cyborg?" he asked not wanting to offend. Cyborg nodded giving him permission "It would be awesome for you join us. And maybe afterword we can get some pizza." he invited with a friendly grin.

Cyborg was honestly taken aback by this. Ever since his accident he didn't really have anyone to call friend, all of his so called "friends" from high school thought he was a freak. And now to see someone genuinely want to be his friend again after so long left him unsure of what to do.

Seeing the big guy still processing Beast Boy gave him some space and turned his attention to the hooded girl "How about you?" he asked with his friendly grin still in place.

"I shouldn't." she said shyly.

"Why not?"

"I'm not the hero type. Trust me, if you knew what I really am, you wouldn't want me around." she said somberly.

"You saw what needed to be done to prevent the most damage and took action. If you weren't the "hero type" then you wouldn't have acted at all. Hell you could have made things worse if you really wanted to, but you decided to help. That makes a hero I my book." Beast Boy said with surprising maturity.

The hooded girl was speechless at his kindness and thanks to her empathy could tell that he was completely genuine. His wide smile made her heart pound in her chest and she nearly made something explode on accident with the sudden powerful wave of emotion flowing through her, but she took a deep breath, centered herself and gave him small smile "I guess I could help a little."

"Sweet! Oh by the way, what's your name?"

"Raven."

"Well nice to meet you Raven."

Seeing this sweet exchange was enough to convince Cyborg to give it a shot "You know what? What the hell, I'm in."

"Welcome to the team big guy!" Beast Boy said offering a high five, which Cyborg eagerly returned.

"I just went solo, so I wasn't really planning on joining a team." Robin cut in, killing the mood a little. But then he gave a smile of his own "But I guess it couldn't hurt to team up just this once."

"You made the right call, because we got company!" Beast Boy exclaimed pointing to a huge alien spacecraft flying over the city.

It launched a big landing probe that broadcast a hologram of a alien lizard man who told the people of Jump City that they were looking for the alien girl. He said that if the humans stayed out of the way the city will only receive minimal damage, but if anyone tried to help her, then they would completely destroy the city. With that warning an army of flying lizard aliens came flying out of the probe in search of their prize.

Robin turned back to Beast Boy "Do you still have her scent?" he asked urgently.

"Yep! Got it locked!" Beast Boy said ready for action.

"Alright little green, lead the way." Cyborg encouraged.

Beast Boy turned to him with wide eyes "Was that..a DBZ Abridged reference?" he asked hopefully.

"..Yeah?"

"It's official. When this is over, you and I are going to be best friends."

(1 hour later.)

With all the lizard aliens about, it really made finding the alien girl much trickier, but they finally found her in a movie rental store devouring every snack in sight, wrappers and all. "Um..those taste better without the wrapper." Beast Boy helpfully informed. The alien girl wipe her face and turned to face the team with a growl, eyes and hands ablaze with green. "It's okay! We're all friends here." Beast Boy said in a placating tone.

"Friends? Why? For what purpose did you free me?" she asked suspiciously.

"Just..trying to be nice." he answered honestly, if a little nervous.

"Nice." she said the word like it was completely foreign to her "We do not have this word on me planet. Closest is 'Rutha'. Weak."

"Well around here 'nice' means nice." Cyborg said assertively. "And if you want us to keep being nice you better tell us why the lizard king took you prisoner."

Her eyes and hands lost their glow and she seemed to become a little submissive "Not prisoner. I am..prize. The Gordanians deliver me to The Citadel. To live out my days as their servant."

"And The Citadel are..?" Raven inquired.

"Not. Nice."

"Well don't you worry..um..you know I never did get your name." Beast Boy rubbed the back of his head in embarrassment.

"In your language it would be 'Starfire'."

"Well then Starfire, don't you worry about a thing! Because we are going to help you get some payback on those lizard creeps!" Beast Boy declared while giving a pose that he thought made him look cool, but just made him goofy.

The team just rolled their eyes and shook their heads in amusement "This is who were taking orders from?" Cyborg asked in disbelief.

Starfire was confused "Pay..back?"

"Yeah you know, give them a well deserved butt kicking for what they did to you." He clarified while trowing a few punchs and kicks for emphasis. "Don't you want to get some payback?"

Starfire's eyes widened at his offer "Yes..I would like to get 'the payback, but you heard Trogaar's warning. If you help me he will destroy your city."

"Something tells me that he would do that anyway just for kicks. Am I wrong?"

"..No, you are correct. Trogaar is a ruthless tyrant that would not hesitate to destroy anyone who prove to be even a minor inconvenience for him."

"Then what do you say Starfire, want us to help you?"

She was stunned "Why? Why would you go out of your way to show me such kindness? Not long ago I was your enemy was I not?"

"Nah that just a misunderstanding. Besides, helping those in need is what heroes do. And that goes double for friends." he said while offering her his hand with a big grin.

Starfire's cheek were hot with a blush and her heart felt like it was going to burst out of her chest. She was so overcome with jot that she ignored his hand and wrapped her arms around Beast Boy in a crushing hug "Oh what a glorious day! Thank you so much, friend Beast Boy!" she said with a radiant smile and spinning him around in mid-air.

"Can't..Breath.." Beast Boy gasped for air.
1111.title: Beast Boy is everyones friend. Except the bad guys

choices: Next episode Sisters. (Were Blackfire makes her debut)
Next episode Final Exam. (Were Jinx makes her debut)
11111.content:
Luckily for Beast Boy The Gordanians blew a hole in the wall saving his ribs and spine from Starfire's powerful embrace. With their prize in sight the lizard aliens charged in, but they were not ready for the team of young heroes who despite being vastly outnumbered were able to more then hold their own. Seeing the superior might of the heroes the hostile aliens made a hasty retreat.

"I believe the appropriate word is..thanks." Starfire said gratefully.

"Oh man! My suite." Cyborg said in distress as his hoodie and pants were reduced to rags during the battle, revealing all of his awesome robotic body.

"So? You look way cooler without it." Beast Boy said encouragingly while giving the thumbs up.

"You really think so?" Cyborg asked hopefully. The rest of the team nodded in agreement bringing a big smile to the bionic hero's face "Thanks guys."

"This isn't over yet." Robin reminded everyone "Now that we interfered-"

"Trogaar will strike harder." Starfire finished his sentence. "It is only a matter of-"

"FOOLS!! THE EARTH SCUM WERE WARNED!" proclaimed Trogaar over his hologram projection "YOUR INSOLENCE WILL BE PUNISHED! YOUR CITY SHALL BE DESTROYED!" With that final word his ships main gun began to power up to turn Jump City into a crater.

"We got to get up there and take out that ship!" Beast Boy declared "Three of as can fly and carry the other two with us, but it's going to be tricky getting past the ship's defenses." he said while placing his hand on his chin thinking of a plan.

"I can get us all in safely." Raven said. With all eyes turned to her she timidly added "I can teleport."

"Sweet! Go Raven!" Beast Boy cheered which made Raven glad she had her hood up so he couldn't see her blush.

"Stay close." she instructed as she channeled her power "Azarath Metrion Zinthos." with that chant a dark energy sphere surrounded the team and transported them into a hallway in the ship's interior.

"That was so cool." Beast Boy said with child-like wonder.

"You don't think it's creepy?" Raven asked surprised.

"Oh it's definitely creepy, but that's why it's so cool!"

"..You are so weird."

"Thank you." Beast Boy then turned serious as he turned to Starfire "Can you guide us to the guns control room?"

"Yes, but be warned Trogaar will be there and he is a powerful warrior." Starfire said.

"Good, then we can get that payback for you." Beast Boy said with a feral grin. He then turned to Cyborg "By the way, you packing any weapons big guy? Like lasers or missiles?"

Cyborg looked to his hands "I'm not sure. I haven't really needed to find out before." he answered honestly.

"I hope you figure it out quick, because we got trouble." Robin informed as he got ready for action. From there the young heroes fought their way to the control room where Trogaar was indeed waiting for them. And while his minions were not much to write about, Trogaar on the other hand was a tough son of a bitch. Even with all the heroes giving him their best shots he powered through gave back just as hard. The battle was so intense that most of the ship was torn to pieces before it crash landed onto an island just off the coast of Jump City.

The heroes were dusting themselves off from the crash and saw that Trogaar was doing the same. "Going at him one at a time isn't going to cut it guys." Beast Boy said "So lets give him everything we've got!"

"Ready!" Robin said as pulled out some explosives.

"Booyah!" Cyborg proclaimed as he charged his new sonic cannon.

"Lets finish it." Raven said with determination as her eyes glowed white and hands glowed black.

"It is time for 'the payback!'" Starfire said eagerly with her eyes and hands ablaze with green fire.

"Alright, TITANS TOGETHER!!" Beast Boy commanded as he turned into a falcon to get some altitude. Robin threw his explosives at Trogaar. They didn't do wuch damage, but they distracted him long enough for Cyborg, Raven and Starfire to hit him with a combined attack of dark, sonic and green energy that knocked him on his scaly ass. Once Beast Boy reached the right height, he dive bombed at over 100mph and just before he hit the ground he morphed into a Blue(well green technically) Whale and body slammed the downed tyrant with 190 tons of weight. He'll be feeling that in the mourning.

With their enemy defeated the team then spent the next few minutes congratulating each other on a job well done. But then a question popped up in everyone's mind that Robin voiced "Titans?"

Beast Boy rubbed the back of his head sheepishly "Well..if we were going to be a team we needed a name so..it was one of the first things that came to mind."

"Titans.." Cyborg tested out the name. He then smiled "I like it."

"And your rallying cry really got me..how you say..'fired up!'" Starfire said with great enthusiasm.

"It's a little cheesy." Raven said bluntly. But she gave a soft smile "But I liked it too."

"You seem to have a knack for bringing people together Beast Boy." Robin said with a proud smile "It's nice to this city will be I good hands."

Beast Boy picked up on Robin's unsaid decision and his ears dropped in sadness "Wait..you're leaving?"

"Like I said, I just went solo and did say this was going to be a one time thing." he reminded "That being said, I will keep in touch in case you guys ever need me." he said as he handed Beast Boy a communicator.

Beast Boy perked up at this a an idea came to him "Could you at least stick around for a pizza victory party?"

Robin was never one to turn down pizza "Sure."

"Aww yeah baby, pizza party!" Cyborg rubbed his hand together and lick his lips in anticipation.

"Why not?" Raven casually shrug her shoulders.

"I too can not wait to celebrate our victory, but I am curious..what is 'pizza'" Starfire asked.

Beast Boy placed a comforting hand on her shoulder "My dear, you are in for a treat."

The newly named Titans partied hard as many a pizza fell victim to five teenagers, one of which had NINE stomachs. And the time came when Robin was about to ride off to Bludhaven to go solo like he planned.

"See ya around." Beast Boy said as he waved goodbye.

"Take care." Raven said quietly but genuinely.

"Good luck in your solo heroing Friend Robin!" said Starfire happily.

"Don't be a stranger man." Cyborg said as he gave him a pat on the back.

As Robin got on his motorcycle he looked to the team with a smile "If you guy's ever need me, I'll be there. And if I'm ever in trouble, I know who to call." he said while giving a two finger salute. He then put on his helmet a road of into the sunrise.
11111.title: First 'Titans Together!'

choices: His charms make her geniunely fall for him and change her ways.
Blackfire's vendette against her sister brings BB and Star closer.
His charms make Blackfire go full Yandere!
111111.content: How does Beast Boy handle Starfire's rouge older sister?
111111.title: Blackfire's debut.

1111111.content:
It's been 8 months since The Gordanian Invasion and things have been going well for the newly dubbed 'Teen Titans'. After the battle Starfire made a public apology to the city for her rather destructive arrival, and vowed to make up for it by using her power in defense of the city and for the public good. The people were weary of her at first, but she quickly won their favor with her boundless kindness and sunny personality. Plus the fact that she was figuratively and literally smoking hot really helped.

With all the alien tech left behind Cyborg quickly and eagerly went to work turning the huge landing probe into The Titans new base of operations and home, appropriately now called 'Titans Tower'. And used all the leftover tech to upgrade his own hardware. The bad guys were in for a nasty surprise when bionic hero busted out the big guns.

Once the tower was complete and all The Titans got their own rooms Raven made it very clear to everyone that nobody EVER goes into her room without permission. A rule that Beast Boy frequently broke thanks to his overwhelming curiosity and desire to make sure she wasn't always locked in her room. Even though it annoyed her greatly for him to invade her privacy, she could always tell that he just didn't want her to feel like she was alone, which she was secretly very thankful for.

Speaking of the changeling it came as a real surprise to him that he was made the official leader of the team. He would have figured Cyborg would be the better choice since he was the oldest, he built the tower and all the weapons, and he proved himself a competent leader in some of the team's earliest outings fighting crime. But everyone agreed that not only was Beast Boy the one who brought everyone together, he was also the most well rounded and charismatic of the team. And when the chips were down he was the most competent hero. So he accepted his position with pride and lead the team well. But whenever there was down time he was always able to pull a prank or two to keep things from getting too serious and boring.

We now find our heroes at a pier carnival with Cyborg chowing down on corndogs and big pretzels, a very unamused looking Raven holding a giant stuffed chicken that Beast Boy won for her in a rig toss, (though privately she was very touched by the gift and would cherish it always) and Beast Boy and Starfire sitting together on the ferries wheel watching the fireworks.

Starfire let out a soft gasp in wonder at the display "Beautiful." she said with shimmering eyes. "Tell me again what they are called." she requested her friend next to her.

"Fireworks." Beast Boy answered happily as he enjoyed the show with her.

"On my home planet, such explosions would mean The Gordanians were attacking. You are certain Earth is not under attack?" she asked with worry.

Beast Boy just smiled at her adorable naivete "Positive. And even if it was, we would just kick their scaly butts again." he said confidently. Seeing her worries eased and her lovely smile return was more amazing then the firework show "Cotton Candy?" he offered his stick of the pink fluffy treat.

Starfire looked unsure "The last time I ate a ball of cotton it was white. And it did not taste very-"

"Yeah, that kind of cotton is for making clothes and stuff, this cotton is for eating. Watch." he said as he took a piece of pink fluff into his mouth and happily chewed on it.

He seemed to enjoy it so Starfire followed his lead, her eyes widened in surprise at the pleasing flavor "Mmm. Eep! It vanished!" she said with pleasant surprise.

"*Chuckle* Yeah, it does that."

"When I first came to this planet, I wasn't sure I would ever fit in. Earth was full of so many strange things, but now I see that-" her speech was interrupted by the sky being lit ablaze with explosions of every color imaginable as the firework show began it's finale.

"Wahoo hoo hoo! Amazing!" Beast Boy cheered at the display.

While Starfire also enjoyed the show her true focus was on the green hero next to her that she had been developing strange, strong, but wonderful feelings for since the day she met him. Not only was he a brave hero, he was kind to everyone that deserved it and fierce to his enemies. He was patient with her as she was still learning about Earth and always took the time to explain things for her in a way that not only made sense, but also made it feel like he wasn't talking down to her or make her feel stupid. He was funny and always did his best to make all his friends happy.

Her eyes shimmered with fondness as she gaze at him "Earth is full of amazing things too," she finished with a soft smile.

"Especially now that you're living here Kori." Beast Boy said with a warm smile of his own.

Hearing him address her by a shortened version of her real name made Starfire's eyes widened, her cheeks hot with a blush and her heart felt like it was going to leap out of her chest at his kind words. She bashfully played with her hair "Do you..truly mean that?" she asked full of hope.

"Of course I do." Beast Boy said gently "Kori, you are one of the most amazing people I've ever met. And you don't ever have to worry about not fitting in. You maybe a little naive when comes to Earth customs, but you're learning fast. Cyborg's half metal, but that doesn't stop him from being one of the coolest guys to ever live. Raven can be very creepy and anti-social, but I know beneath all that doom and gloom is a heart of pure gold. Plus I really love her sarcasm. Here with us, a bunch of misfits, is where you belong."

Starfire forgot how to breath for a few seconds and she felt compelled to lean in and claim his lips again. On Tamaran lip contact simply meant the transfer of knowledge, but her on Earth it means..more. And she wanted more.

But before she could get more a strange squid like machine snatched her from her seat and carried her away towards space. "Starfire!" Beast Boy cried out in alarm before turning into a falcon to chase after her.

Starfire struggled to get free, but the machines tentacles held tight "Wherever you are taking me, I do not wish to go!" she shouted as she blasted her captor with a starbolt which managed to get her free. Just then Beast Boy shifted into a monkey and landed on the machines head. He found some circuitry and wires that look important, so he ripped them apart. This seemed to do the trick as the machine started to wobble and spark, signaling that it was about to blow.

So he jumped off and turned human as Starfire caught him in her arms and they watched it exploded "What was that?" Starfire thought out loud.

"I don't know. But whatever it was, it can't hurt you now." Beast Boy said comfortingly.

"But, why did it wish to hurt me at all?" she said greatly confused.

"Good question."
1111111.title: A tender moment ruined.

11111111.content:
After telling Cyborg and Raven what happened, The Titans returned home with Starfire in particularly good spirits as she hovered into the room with Beast Boy still in her arms "Come friend, I shall thank you for my rescue by reciting The Poem Of Gratitude. All 6000 verses." she said with the most radiant smile on her face.

Hearing this made Beast Boy very worried, because even though he loved Starfire to death, he wasn't sure his sanity could handle listening to a poem that long. He had enough trouble trying to understand Earth poetry. He looked over to his teammates with pleading eyes, but they took a big step back as if to say "You're on your own." [Traitors.] he thought bitterly.

"I see you haven't changed a bit." said a naturally sultry voice. Everyone turned their attention over to the voice to see it belonged to a young woman casually leaning against the couch that could arguably be called even prettier the Starfire. In fact she almost look completely identical to Starfire, but she had an even fuller figure, dark purple hair and eyes, and had an outfit that looked just like Starfire's when she first came to Earth, only without the headpiece. "When we were little, I was always rescuing Starfire."

Starfire squealed in joy as she dropped Beast boy to the floor "Sister!" she cried happily as she flew to embrace the young woman which she happily returned.

"Brought you a present." the young woman presented a gorgeous green jewel necklace.

"*Gasp!* A Centauri Moon Diamond?!" Starfire said in disbelief "Where did you get-"

"From The Centauri Moons of course." her sister said like it was no big deal as she placed her present on Starfire's neck "Oh look! It matches your eyes!" she said proudly.

Starfire's eyes seemed to literally turn to diamonds for a second as she fell in love with her sisters gift "You must meet my friends!" she said joyously as her pulled her sister towards her friends "I wish to introduce my big sister!"

"Blackfire." she introduce herself as she walked closer to The Titans "And since Star has told me all about The Titans in her transmissions, let me guess..Cyborg." she pointed to the bionic hero.

"Pleased to meet you little lady." Cyborg politely said while offering his hand, which Blackfire then proceeded to effortlessly crush like an empty soda can. But this didn't bother him, if anything he was impressed "Little lady, BIG handshake! Well alright."

"Raven. I like that gemstone on your Ajna chakra." she said to the dark hero.

"You..know about chakra's?" Raven asked honestly impressed.

"I got way into meditation on Altera Prime." Blackfire then turned her attention to the green team leader who finally picked himself off the floor. "And you must be Beast Boy. Oh I am just loving the pointy ears, they are just adorable!" she gushed as she cupped said ears in her hands.

"Aw thanks. I always knew that girls dig pointy ears." Beast Boy said proudly as the beautiful alien played them.

"Oh I most certainly do." she said flirty.

"So! Sister what brings you to Earth?" Satrfire asked before her older sibling got to close to her love interest.

"I was in the quadarnt. Thought I'd see if Earthlings like to party." she said casually as she got comfortable on the couch. "Besides, I needed a rest, nearly got sucked into a Black Hole on the way here."

"A Black Hole?!

"No way!"

Hearing a possible awesome story behind that Cyborg, Beast Boy, even Raven gathered around the couch to hear more, which Blackfire was more then happy to tell. "Okay, so I'm cruising through The Draconous Nebula and-"

"Sister, that nebula is full of Black Holes! You know travel there is forbidden!" Starfire scolded.

"Most fun things in life are." Blackfire casually countered. "Now be a sweetie and fetch me one of those 'sodas' I've heard so much about. So anyway I'm approaching an Event Horizon at light speed when all of a sudden-"

"I see you haven't changed either." Beast Boy heard Satrfire say flatly to herself as she got a soda from the fridge. He made a note to think about that later as he continued to listen to the rest of Blackfire's story.
11111111.title: A "friendly" family reunion.

111111111.content:
As Beast Boy hanged out with his friends on the couch he thought about how over the last few days on how Blackfire really seemed to make an impression on The Titans by showing off her surprising skills in video games, dark poetry and martial arts. It may have just been because of what she learned from Starfire, but Blackfire just seemed to blend in better with Earth customs then her young sister. And this seemed to be a fact that she had no problem subtly rubbing in Starfire's face. She especially made it a habit to hang out with Beast Boy whenever possible.

Now Beast Boy would like to think that it was just because she genuinely wanted to spend time with him, but he couldn't help but feel that Blackfire was mostly doing it to make Starfire jealous. Which would be a shame since Blackfire really was fun to hang out with. She just had this natural charisma to her and honestly better social skills then her sister. Instinct is a powerful thing. For most creatures, it rules every aspect of their life, their existence. It is the driving force behind the circle of life. From the smallest, meanest single cell organism, to the largest, greatest beasts in the ocean, all life is governed by Instinct.

To each kind there are given certain specific, peculiar instincts, perhaps unique to them and them alone, but for all creatures there are also at least two fundamental, universal instincts. The need to sustain one's own life, and the urge to propagate further generations, howsoever that may be done -- these are the two most fundamental and absolute of all instincts, the foundation upon which the entire circle of life is balanced.

Even humans are ruled by instinct. It is the impulse at the back of one's mind, the unthinking urge to do this or that, for no reason other than that you must.

The desire to feed, to sustain one's own life, is universal to all life forms. And so, too, is the desire to reproduce -- to "mate", for those many organisms which replicate via the mixing of genes with other members of their species. Food and sex, two of the most fundamental forces in human history, and in the history of all animal life. These are both powerful.

But sex is the stronger. Salmon will push their bodies to the point of breaking down, simply to reach the waters where they were born, to spawn the next generation of their kind. Octopus males die after sex, and the females will starve themselves to death guarding their unhatched young. And for countless other kinds and species, also, to reproduce marks the end of their own lives, which they would otherwise preserve instinctively.

So powerful, thus, is the desire to propagate, to reproduce, to mate. This is, perhaps, the greatest and most terrible of all instincts, the single most formidable, fundamental driving force in life as we know it.

Now.

http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1935036-Naruto-Last-Man-Alive
http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1901170-Hayate-Hypno-Harem

Also, please, if you're going to add, try to add something with actual content. Meaningless single sentence choice chapter can be very wearisome to read through, and if you're adding those, you should at least also try to add an equal or greater number of chapters with actual stuff going on in them. I'm not expecting novel length entries or anything like that, but at least TRY to contribute something to the plot (inasmuch as there is one) in some appreciable way with your adds.

That said, I do try to also add to the stories of those people who add to mine, and while this would seem like just plain common courtesy, it's still apparently exceptional enough to warrant noting. Plus, it can work as incentive to get y'all adding! :D

OH ALSO, while I am not that much of a bestiality fan, since this is a primarily BEAST BOY centric interactive I suppose you can do some of that, if it floats your boat. Watersports are also acceptable, but I would prefer to avoid stuff like scat or fart worship.

That is all. Have fuuuuun~! :3c
